name: 楊麗祝
objective:
本課程將就臺灣目前的史蹟，依其性質分類使修課學生更進一步瞭解這些史蹟，並透過專家演講及實地參與史蹟導覽活動，學習如何將所學到的史蹟知識介紹給一般旅遊者或有興趣的大眾。
This course aims to introduce different types of historical sites in Taiwan, and application related to the studies of cultural tourism. Lecturers, speeches and field trips are included in this course to help student to learn the ways to introduce cultural spots to visitors, includes tour planning, stories interpretation and oral presentation.

scorePolicy:
